Chapters: 0:00 - Microsoft's mission for adaptive, autonomous defense enabling strategic work 00:07:08 - Addressing alert overload and false positives in SOC workflows 00:13:29 - Attacker federates compromised account into AWS; Defender XDR confirms compromise 00:13:53 - Automatic containment revokes session tokens and disables compromised accounts 00:16:26 - Recap and transition to conversation on agentic AI and trust with analyst Ali Mellon 00:27:10 - Importance of Encoding Runbooks, Guardrails, and Explainability 00:29:19 - Evolving Role of Security Analysts in the Agentic Era 00:36:05 - Importance of Vendor Transparency: Labeling Generative AI and Confidence Levels 00:44:15 - Conversation Wrap-Up and Closing Remarks
